General.Name: BRD-Groupe Societe Generale S.A.
General.Description: BRD - Groupe Société Générale S.A. provides a range of banking and financial services to corporates and individuals in Romania. It operates in Retail and Non-Retail segments. The company offers savings, deposits, and current accounts; term deposits; personal, housing, youth, refinancing, agricultural, and medical treatment loans; credit and debit cards; and transfers, investments, and insurance services. It also offers payroll, invoice collection, card processing, business cards, and cash collection services; global transaction banking; structured finance and corporate loans; mergers and acquisitions; treasury; and securities services, as well as engages in equity and debt capital market operations. In addition, the company provides internet and mobile banking, payments, receipt and collection, factoring and discounting, and custody and depository; letter of guarantee; financing; foreign exchange; online trading; risk management; and clearing services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bucharest, Romania. BRD - Groupe Société Générale S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Société Générale S.A.
